proteins: Eggs - 16, Chicken breast - 420g, Lean beef mince (5% fat) - 440g, Turkey mince - 220g, Salmon fillet - 220g, Bacon - 4 rashers, Greek yogurt - 200g, Whey protein - 6 scoops
carbs: Wholegrain bread - 10 slices, Rice - 140g (dry), Egg noodles - 220g, Pasta - 140g (dry), Sweet potato - 300g, Baby potatoes - 320g, Large wrap - 1, Baked beans - 150g, Oats - 50g, Garlic bread - 1 portion
fats: Avocado - 1 medium (120g), Cheese - 90g, Almonds - 35g, Peanut butter - 65g, Hummus - 65g, Feta - small amount, Sour cream - small amount, Butter - 30g, Olive oil - small bottle, Sesame oil - small bottle, Whole milk - 1.2 litres, Honey - small jar, Protein bar (25g) - 1
produce: Bananas - 7, Apple - 1, Tomatoes - 1, Spinach mushrooms broccoli green beans stir fry veg salad, Salad dressing - small bottle
pantry: Soy sauce, Tomato pasta sauce - 1 jar
